content: https //www facebook com/bluebellmooncrochet/ 1 https //www instagram com/bluebellmooncrochet/ tell a worm your worry and feel it fade away pretty soon everything will be ok ©2021 text and images by jay robertson of bluebell moon all rights reserved https //www facebook com/bluebellmooncrochet/ 2 https //www instagram com/bluebellmooncrochet/ ©2021 text and images by jay robertson of bluebell moon all rights reserved https //www facebook com/bluebellmooncrochet/ 3 https //www instagram com/bluebellmooncrochet/ into the final chain crochet the following half_double_crochet 14dc half_double_crochet slip_stitch bind off and weave in your ends on the back of the worm s head ©2021 text and images by jay robertson of bluebell moon all rights reserved https //www facebook com/bluebellmooncrochet/ 4 https //www instagram com/bluebellmooncrochet/ on either ravelry or etsy as anonymous hackers have been known to upload pattern files containing viruses which enables them to access your computer and could mean that they steal your personal and financial details these patterns take a long time to develop and write please respect the designer ©2021 text and images by jay robertson of bluebell moon all rights reserved
